title: Wealth Management for Professional Athletes
itunes:title: Wealth Management for Professional Athletes
description:
Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu, and Mike Lynch speak with Noel LaMontagne Director of the PRO Team at Verdence Capital Advisors, and a former offensive lineman for the Cleveland Browns about wealth management for professional athletes.. We also speak with MLB Network's Jon Morosi on the state of the MLB lockout.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
